titleInfo.title: Letter, J. Crozier Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Charlotte, N.C. 1867 September 20

mods.abstract: 1867 Sept.20 J.Crozier Ramsey, Knoxville, Tenn., to his father, J.G.M. Ramsey, Charlotte, N.C. Encloses deed for Lizzie and gives instructions for signing and having it notarized. News of a shortage of houses and new construction of homes in Knoxville. Advises his family to board if they return to Knoxville because of high rents on houses. Expresses confidence that his father's cases will be won in court and that the Ramsey family could get along well in Knoxville. Refers to the death of Alex's son.

subject.topic: Actions and defenses -- Tennessee, East -- 19th century
Ramsey, J. Crozier (John Cozier) d. 1868 -- Correspondence
Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884 -- Correspondence
